definition: to mingle with the people incognito
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: Emperor Qianlong visited the Pomegranate Garden, paying court to Pomegranate Blossom Fairy.
sentences.chinese: 乾隆微服私訪石榴園，向榴花仙女求愛。

sentences.english: He was very distressed has been no answer, so incognito travel.
sentences.chinese: 他很苦悶一直沒有答案，於是便微服私訪。

sentences.english: Weifu Sifang was popular not only in ancient but in modern China.
sentences.chinese: 無論在中國古代還是當下，微服私訪現象都較爲常見。

sentences.english: Incognito plays "Nights Over Egypt" live in Seoul.
sentences.chinese: 微服私訪次在埃及居住在漢城的夜。

sentences.english: The premier often visits supermarket or department stores in ordinary dress.
sentences.chinese: 總理經常微服私訪超市或百貨商店。
